title: Therefore, we can see Taiwan is truly a place of licentious indecency.

replies.msg:
Therefore, it is said that Taiwan is a country of slutty cum-dumpsters and horny fuckboys. Apart from deriving ephemeral pleasure before invaded by the CCP by calling Hong Kong chi-na, all they have in their minds are: making out, sex, affairs, betrayal, fucking others’ spouses, incest, rape, seduction, and last but not least, fondle with the drunk.

Taiwanese spend their lives either thinking about having sex or having sex itself. They won't allow anything else to occupy their minds; they stuff themselves with plans to fuck their brother/sister-in-laws, nephews and nieces, siblings of their partners, friends' children or even grandchildren, mentally retarded cult adherents and their children and grandchildren too.

Bosses want to shove it up their secretaries; doctors want to feel-up their patients. A thief can get away by giving a blowjob to the security guard, who may be a virgin longing for sex. In schools, the highest aspiration of teachers is to make love with their students, while the students themselves are fantasising fondling their teachers’ big boobs as they lie on their beds.

Taiwanese are better than professional photographers when they're engaged having sex. Whenever they break up, their hard earned photography skills pay off as the nudes would almost always warrant some quality goodbye sex which lingers on after years.

What would a real Taiwanese girl do when she argues with her current boyfriend? Call her ex-es! After all they were the people who understand her mind AND body the most. They would drown into a nostalgia of having deep conversations, which would then turn into a deep throat that would legitimately condone the current relationship crisis. Her ex would ask if he could creampie her. She initially refuses and shakes her head, but nevertheless gets filled up with warm Taiwanese milk tea.

Therefore, we can see Taiwan is truly a place of licentious indecency.
